\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {V_X} && {U_X} & {\text{in} \ \mathscr A} \\
	X &&&& {X[1]} & {\text{in} \ \mathsf{Ho}\mathscr A}
	\arrow["{v_x}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["Q", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{u_x}", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["Q", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["Q", from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{[1]}", dashed, from=2-1, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
